items.title: Brie and Fruit
items.descript: A brie style cashew cheese served  with local honey, fresh fruit and a bread made of walnut coconut and chia flour.

items.title: Tomato Flat Bread
items.descript: Crispy vegetable and flax flatbread with pistachio and basil pesto, fresh local tomatoes and creamy chevre style almond cheese.

items.title: Chaat Puri
items.descript: Crispy flax cups stuffed with coconut, green peas and sunflower served with chili spiced mango chutney and mint coconut and cucumber coulis.

items.title: Summer Berry Salad
items.descript: Fresh Summer Berries, chopped arugula, shaved turmeric, coconut, ginger and dehydrated orange.

items.title: Lasagna
items.descript: Soft flax zucchini and spinach noodles, with sun dried tttomato marinara, coconut and almond ricotta, chopped kale and basil with fresh heirloom tomatoes and cashew parmesan. Served with a fresh, shaved green bean salad.

items.title: Perogies
items.descript: Chia seed and coconut dough filled with carrot, sunflower and plantain, served with red cabbage, caraway seeds and chopped greens topped with pumpkin and sesame seed cream and a juniper vinaigrette and pickled then crisped red onion.

items.title: Zucchini Noodle Alfredo
items.descript: Spiralized zucchini noodles with cashew alfredo sauce, swiss chard and basil topped with pistachio parmesan. Served with semi dehydrated portobello steak.

items.title: Burrito Bowl
items.descript: Peppers, tomatoes and onion sauteed with kale and black beans in a chili spiced tomato sauce served over brown rice with avocado cashew cheese sauce and fresh salsa.

items.title: Green Bean Noodles
items.descript: Shiitake and enoki mushrooms, broccoli, water chestnuts, thinly sliced collard greens, miso and mushroom and black garlic broth, crushed peanuts and basil.

items.title: Indian Spiced Eggplant
items.descript: Tomato, cauliflower, swiss chard, green peas, chickpeas and coconut milk . Served with brown rice.

items.title: Oyster Scallop Salad
items.descript: Seared king oyster mushrooms with seaweed, carrots, kale, spinach and wild black rice with a sesame vinaigrette and fresh cucumbers.

items.title: Peanut Butter Chopped Salad
items.descript: Kale, peppers, carrots, cabbage, celery and broccoli chopped up with peanuts and chickpeas with a maple sweetened peanut butter sauce.

items.title: gardan salad
items.descript: Baby greens, kale, avocado, peppers, carrots, cucumber and tomato with a balsamic vinaigrette and pumpkin seeds.

items.title: Goji berry and Lemon Curd NF
items.descript: Served with black berrty pure, pumpkin seed crumble and acai berry sorbet.

items.title: Carrot cake
items.descript: Cocoa butter frosting and a cinnamon and fig sauce.

items.title: Rose and Vanilla Scented Cheesecake
items.descript: Cardamon crust saffron and mango sauce and raspberry dust.

items.title: Chocolate Brownie
items.descript: Chocolate almond toffee, fresh strawberries and strawberry sauce and vanilla poppy seed ice cream.
